passives.name: Jump III Extension
passives.desc:
Jump III use +1

When using Jump III:
 • Moderate boost to BRV granted based on ATK
 • Adds 2-hit ranged BRV attack after multiplying BRV
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Slight Dragoon's Pride boost、 duration +2

When using Jump:
BRV attack hit count becomes 2; largely increased cumulative BRV damage
passives.short_desc: Jump III Extension: Boost to Jump III

passives.name: Buffed Attack Boost Up
passives.desc: Moderately raises MAX BRV、 ATK with active buffs
passives.short_desc: Buffed Attack Boost Up: Raises MAX BRV、 ATK

passives.name: Gungnir Extension
passives.desc: When using Gungnir:\n • BRV attack hit count becomes 4; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage\n • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%

passive.name: BRVアップスラストグロース
passive.desc:
「BRVアップスラスト」の使用回数＋1

「BRVアップスラスト」使用時
自身の攻撃力小アップの効果を2ACTION追加
passive.short_desc: BRVアップスラストグロース：「BRVアップスラスト」の性能アップ

passive.name: Ruler of the Skies
passive.desc:
When using Jump III:
 • Increased BRV multiplier after increasing BRV based on ATK
 • Turn rate+
 • Dragoon's Pride duration+
passive.short_desc: Ruler of the Skies: Boost to Jump III

passive.name: Dragoon's Power
